tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: I guess they didn't have "real" lesbian characters on TV pre-1997, but I get the sense that Ivanova was supposed to be. #B5S03

tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: Marcus: "I sense in [Ivanova] a key unturned." Man, that's quite a metaphor. By key you mean? #B5S03

tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: Lieutenant failed the interview, and his non-chance with Ivanova. Now Marcus is talking about boning her. #B5S03

tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: Oh no I wasn't ready for this horrible fremdshamen moment. I don't watch shows like that. Just get back to space laser battles plz. #B5S03

tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: Y'ever been on what you thought was a date but wasn't? Or what you thought wasn't but was? I empathise with the bumbling lieutenant. #B5S03

tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: The new lieutenant thinks Ivanova is asking him out for a booty call, and he appears literally terrified. #B5S03

tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: Can you imagine Marcus singing lead on a yacht rock album? Sea breeze in his auburn locks. I can see it. #B5S03

tweet.author: sixohsix
tweet.post: Marcus' haircut has not aged well. It's like my dad's 70's haircut. Or my haircut. Uh, it's great, I mean! #B5S03
